abstract: Nothing says “I love you” like up to six times the mobile back-haul capacity, according to a new Cisco ad.
snippet: Nothing says “I love you” like up to six times the mobile back-haul capacity, according to a new Cisco ad.
lead_paragraph: In my experience, a discussion about large back-haul capacity stands as a surefire way to kill a romantic mood. And yet here’s Cisco Systems arguing that such talk will win over your loved one on Valentine’s Day.

headline.main: Cisco Pitches $250,000 Router as Valentine’s Gift
